note:
(He/him)
Hi, thanks for visiting! I'm a writer of adventurous, wacky novels and plan to self-publish my first this year. As art has always been a passion, I also do my own covers and artwork - and paint! When I'm not doing those things I'm playing bass in a band or recording my own music. (It's a learning process!) None of these pay the bills, but they keep me sane (mostly).

I've got a website, a work in progress @
jmpayer.net
